snippet: The stock market looked as if it would end the week on a down note, but solid retail earnings and demand for telecommunications stocks helped push shares higher.
abstract: Better earnings results from retailers and demand for telecommunications shares push stock market to small gain.
lead_paragraph: The stock market looked as if it would end the week on a down note, but solid retail earnings and demand for telecommunications stocks helped push shares higher.

headline.main: On Up-and-Down Day, Market Edges Higher
headline.print_headline: On Up-and-Down Day, Market Edges Higher
